alert.note: Alert for Central Virginia Blue Ridge; Northern Virginia Blue Ridge (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 11 at 8:42PM EST until February 12 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM TO 10 PM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of two to four inches with localized amounts up to five inches south of Interstate 64. Total ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Northern Virginia Blue Ridge and Central Virginia Blue Ridge. * WHEN...From 7 AM to 10 PM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. When venturing outside, watch your first few steps taken on steps, sidewalks, and driveways, which could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.

area.areaDesc: Central Virginia Blue Ridge; Northern Virginia Blue Ridge
